Package iflores.vamos

Class Async<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • iflores.vamos.Async<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the return type of the operation
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Supplier<T>
    public final class Async<T>
extends Object
implements Supplier<T>
    Represents an operation that may not yet be completed.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      CompletionStage<T> async()
      Returns a CompletionStage representing this Async's operation.
      T get()
      Waits if necessary for this Async to complete, then returns the result.
